description:
Download a file by providing the file owner, access expiry, and a valid signature.

Example cURL request:

```console
curl -X GET "https://api.replicate.com/v1/files/cneqzikepnug6xezperrr4z55o/download?expiry=1708515345&owner=mattt&signature=zuoghqlrcnw8YHywkpaXQlHsVhWen%2FDZ4aal76dLiOo%3D"
```

parameters.description: The ID of the file to download
parameters.name: file_id

parameters.description: The username of the user or organization that uploaded the file
parameters.name: owner

parameters.description: A Unix timestamp with expiration date of this download URL
parameters.name: expiry

parameters.description: A base64-encoded HMAC-SHA256 checksum of the string '{owner} {id} {expiry}' generated with the Files API signing secret
parameters.name: signature
